channel.title: How do i make a client file from scratch?
channel.description: ok i downloaded a 317 server that has no client what so ever... so how do i make a client file or something like it so i can have something to work with here? eh?

item.title: How do i make a client file from scratch?
item.dc:creator: @baddy351 baddy351
item.description:
@baddy351 wrote:

Its alot more than just that RiiPiiN. It involves knowing packet handling (How they interact, server and client sided), creating a handle, loading the spites. AKA. Its a hell of alot more than GUI/Applets. Btw those both fall under the same catagory. MR. can’t make a menu in them xD. A GUI is a Graphical User Interface, so everything that has an output is part of a GUI, windows is a gigantic GUI, etc.

I did not even go in depth, there is no reason to try to do something JaGex has already done. Thus being why I said download a deobfuscated client, and then work from there.
(You will still have to learn Java Swing, there is a HUGE database oracle has. Learn this as well at File IO).

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make a client file from scratch?
